id.description: The unique identifier for the variant

product_id.description: The unique identifier for the product associated with the variant

sku.description: The unique SKU (stock keeping unit) of the variant

position.description: The position of the variant in the product's list of variants

inventory_policy.description: The inventory policy for the variant

compare_at_price.description: The original price of the variant before any discount

fulfillment_service.description: The fulfillment service for the variant

inventory_management.description: The method used to manage inventory for the variant

option1.description: The value for option 1 of the variant

option2.description: The value for option 2 of the variant

option3.description: The value for option 3 of the variant

created_at.description: The date and time when the variant was created

updated_at.description: The date and time when the variant was last updated

taxable.description: Indicates whether taxes are applied to the variant

barcode.description: The barcode associated with the variant

grams.description: The weight of the variant in grams

image_id.description: The unique identifier for the image associated with the variant

weight_unit.description: The unit of measurement for the weight of the variant

inventory_item_id.description: The unique identifier for the inventory item associated with the variant

inventory_quantity.description: The current inventory quantity for the variant

old_inventory_quantity.description: The previous inventory quantity for the variant

presentment_prices.description: The prices of the variant for presentation in different currencies

price.description: The price of the variant in a different currency

currency_code.description: The currency code of the price
The currency code of the price

requires_shipping.description: Indicates whether the variant requires shipping

admin_graphql_api_id.description: The unique identifier for the variant used by the GraphQL Admin API

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop where the variant is listed
